[Adrenaline Rush](/Feats.aspx?ID=5807) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength. While you are raging, increase your encumbered and maximum Bulk limits by 2; you also gain a +1 status bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks to lift heavy objects, [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296), and [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=2375).
name: Adrenaline Rush
